briefdescription.para: Advanced MCU-specific implementation of the unified BaseGpio class with ESP32C6/ESP-IDF v5.5+ features.

detaileddescription.para: This file provides concrete implementations of the unified BaseGpio class for microcontroller-based GPIO pins with support for both basic and advanced features. It supports dynamic mode switching, pull resistor configuration, various output drive modes, and advanced ESP32C6-specific features like glitch filtering, power management, and RTC GPIO. The implementation includes interrupt handling, debouncing, and hardware-accelerated operations.
